message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12500. I believe it's a fair price considering its value and rarity.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm willing to pay that price, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $9000 is a bit lower than my initial price, but I'm willing to compromise. I'm thinking of a price of $11000. It's still a great deal, considering the product's value and uniqueness. What do you think?
I'm still interested in the product, but I think $11000 is a bit too high. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, so how about $9500? I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.

I understand your willingness to meet in the middle, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go as low as $9500. I'm willing to compromise further and offer you a price of $10800. It's a great deal, and I think it's worth considering. What do you think?
I'm still not sure I can go as high as $10800. I'm willing to meet you at $9800, but I think that's as high as I can go. I'm hoping we can come to an agreement at this price.

I understand your hesitation, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9800. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer you a price of $10500. It's a great deal, and I think it's worth considering. What do you think?

I'm starting to get a bit frustrated with the back and forth, but I'm still interested in the product. I'm willing to meet you at $9500, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. I'm not sure I can go any lower than that.

I understand your frustration, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9500. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer you a price of $10200. It's a great deal, and I think it's worth considering. What do you think?

I'm not willing to go any higher than $9500, and I'm starting to think it's time to walk away. I'm willing to meet you at $9500, but if you're not willing to accept that, I'm going to have to consider buying from John for $10000.
